thread.content:
The blu-ray for Fool's Gold (2008) may not have a main menu page (?!?!?!?!), but we're watching it anyway

Follow our commentary on #pyrite21

#SchoolsInSession #AllThatGlittersIsMovieMagic #EarfulofFools #GetThatGold #McConaughey4Gov
Hi, I'm Hervey and I'll be commenting on this movie today, looking forward to spending time in the sunny caribbean #pyrite21
Hi, I'm Alan and I'll be commenting on this movie today. Let's see if we can find some FeS2. #pyrite21
Want to make clear how weird it feels to have a blu-ray auto-play #pyrite21
This is already very relaxing. Hanging out in the air over a Caribbean isle with guitar music playing. #pyrite21
For the record, I am drinking a peach White Claw Iced Tea. #pyrite21
I need to learn if the Spanish empire really used Havana as a way-station on the way to shipping valuable specie back to Europe #pyrite21
This music is unmistakable George Fenton #TheMaster #pyrite21
McConaughey emerges! Glorious. #pyrite21
So far, we've learned that McConaughey is very invested in treasure-hunting, he has a Ukrainian friend/colleague, and he allowed his boat to explode; really setting the scene early #pyrite21
This movie is moving along very nicely. #pyrite21
We've now introduced a second boat, inhabited by a soon-to-be divorced (from McConaughey) Kate Hudson and a very posh and regal Donald Sutherland; and folks: what a boat #pyrite21
Oh wow, Kevin Hart; didn't know he existed back in 2008 #pyrite21
McConaughey is about to be murdered #RIPMcConaughey #pyrite21
Hijinks have ensued. #RIPMcConaughey #pyrite21
Things are going from bad to worse, McConaughey is gonna get murdered.... and also divorced, effective 10am tomorrow morning #pyrite21
This was a more satisfying and interesting fight scene than anything in that James Bond movie #pyrite21
I'm learning so much, including that guns work underwater #pyrite21
This movie returns again and again to expanses of blue Caribbean water; a pretty good recipe for a pleasant film product #pyrite21
BEHOLD, this dude! These boat kids are real good. #pyrite21

McConaughey's big problem has been introduced: he doesn't have money

Nothing a little *gold* can't solve #pyrite21
McConaughey's biggest problem is that he's chronically late. This has already been established. #pyrite21
Same difference: time equals money #pyrite21
Damn, they're divorced now; Florida law is harsh #pyrite21
"You want history, it's out in the ocean baby." #ClassicMovieQuotes #McConaugheyWisdom #pyrite21
I have now learned the importance of having boat insurance #pyrite21
Congrats to McConaughey, for avoiding permanent and devastating head trauma #pyrite21
Very pleasant boat atmosphere. #boatmosphere #pyrite21
Boats are where personal growth happens; Donald Sutherland is a boat man, and as a result knows that Kate Hudson is really made of #pyrite21
Kevin Hart's lackey wondering if he has MapQuest on his flip phone; truly a different age #pyrite21
Oh wow, it's Nick's ex-gf from Nick and Norah, wow, it's been too long #pyrite21
That yacht does not look big enough to have a helicopter landing pad, and they cut around it to not show it actually landing. #MovieMagic #pyrite21
A hat chase! Glorious. #pyrite21
For the second time today, I've learned an inflatable boat is no match for a non-inflatable boat #pyrite21
Worth underlining how blinged-out the rich daughter's Sidekick3 is, what a decadent phone #pyrite21
The Sidekick's lack of a lock screen has been her downfall. #pyrite21
Rich daughter has just insulted boat culture, no greater insult to her father #pyrite21
Damn, these two are so perfect for each other, I'll never forgive Florida Law for mandating their automatic divorce #pyrite21
Enjoying this in-depth explanation of the history of this gold. #pyrite21
I kinda zoned out, I imagine the movie will repeat anything important #pyrite21
"Wow, you guys must really like treasure" #ClassicMovieLines #pyrite21
Kate Hudson will be such a great lecturer one day, assuming she finds treasure sufficient enough to fund her PhD; she even got the rich daughter to pay attention #pyrite21
McConaughey and the rich daughter are bonding over being stupid, really touching #pyrite21
I think rich daughter is going to be the ultimate hero of this story. She's making excellent progress on her PADI certification now. #pyrite21
They're just one big happy fam at last! #pyrite21
Rich daughter's phone gets excellent cell service at sea. #pyrite21
Rich daughter found a good website on her Sidekick3 for discovering land ownership records for various caribbean islands #pyrite21
Yacht confirmed to not have a helipad. #pyrite21
This movie has so much to say #pyrite21
Precious Gem has now obtained a key artifact (old sword); maritime law is very clear: if any items are blown out of the sea floor and end up on your boat, you can keep them #pyrite21
Banana and clear Cessna 208 seaplane sighting! #FlyCessna #pyrite21
Penny-a-point gin rummy time! #pyrite21
After "21" (2008), I now reactively recoil whenever I see playing cards appear during a film #pyrite21
Rich daughter has scored 2,800,000 points in gin rummy #pyrite21
Gin rummy has ended in disaster as the family history spills over into the game. Gemma won that money fair and square. #pyrite21
Donald Sutherland is really a sore loser #pyrite21
McConaughey now wielding an ancient Spanish sword while first-wave ska plays in the atmospheric Pelican Bar, this is all extremely pleasant #pyrite21
Bigg Bunny Rum! This film has a signature rum brand! #UltimateFilm #ProbablyTheUltimateFeelingRightNow #pyrite21
Bigg Bunny is a clear reference to open-source icon "Big Buck Bunny" #pyrite21

This movie seemed to go to extreme lengths to show that people cannot be killed or even badly hurt, and then suddenly Bigg Bunny's lackey just suddenly gets murked

Wow #pyrite21
Cool turtle #coolturtle #pyrite21
Cleaning up the ocean floor, one metallic object at a time. #pyrite21
It's great how the movie never for a moment makes you doubt McConaughey and Kate Hudson are a dream couple; their obstacles are purely external (money), and can clearly be easily resolved #pyrite21
The music that they played as they scavenged the sea floor was very similar to the vineyard music from early California's Great America #pyrite21
Ship identification very, very easily found now that they know where to look. #pyrite21
Finding treasure is hard; it takes decades to find inspiration, and then up to 20-25 minutes of exploring #pyrite21
McConaughey with the centuries-old dagger casually tucked into his shorts. #pyrite21
Wow, I pieced together that Donald Sutherland named the boat after rich daughter 20 minutes ago; this movie really rewards close watching #pyrite21
Finnegan! Finnegan! Finn Finnegan! #pyerite21
Finn just wheeling around in the cemetery on his motorbike. #pyerite21
What's in the barrel? Treasure? #pyrite21
This is so much better as an action movie than #QoS #pyrite21
We've got a cheap shovel hit to the crotch. Classic comedic sequence. #pyrite21
Close call #pyrite21
This blow-hole (aka geyser) contains crabs, and also treasure #pyrite21
Impressive that this treasure has remained firmly lodged against extremely violent waves for hundreds of years, but Kate Hudson's light jostling sets it free #pyrite21
Tess' repeated diving maneuvers are extremely stressful. #pyrite21
To stab someone would be inappropriate in this light-hearted comedy; but to stab someone in the crotch is okay #pyrite21
Great sequence of that man just getting completely ground into a bloody pulp by the force of the geyser. A light-hearted comedic romp. #pyerite21
Say what you will about Bigg Bunny, but he's one hell of a seaplane pilot. #pyrite21
McConaughey is now dangling from an airplane while being shot at #pyrite21
I'd love to see the NTSB report on this one. #ProbablePilotError #pyrite21
I can't think of any notable flight simulator games for PlayStation. What did he learn to fly from? #pyrite21
Another movie in which the main character must ruin one example of each mode of transportation. #pyrite21
Wow, everybody's lives are now improved considerably, all thanks to something as simple as "treasure" #pyrite21
Really nice quick ending. Wraps up real fast. #pyrite21
Yeah, just have some music swell, put some visuals to indicate people's life trajectories, end on a close-up of a rock; classic way to wrap up #pyrite21

This movie fucking ruled; the exact right amount of stupid

It's very, very *slow* however, and all the scenes and locations blend together; limits its Earful potential #pyrite21
You're just looking for excuses. Rarely has a movie been so ready to dig deeply into. #pyrite21

It's really great, but I'm not sure it's actually *that* thematically rich

Also, very very leisurely #pyrite21
It's important to note that this "PLAY MOVIE" screen was not accessible until the end of the movie. #pyrite21
